newscontainer.newsDescription: The Server at NRM was put into operation on the 6th of May. We are now focusing on implementing seamless data up- and download capabilities to further enhance our services. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to innovate and improve our systems to better serve you.

The purpose of this collaboration is to evaluate and construct automated systems in palynology for all concerned research areas. Hence, diverse pollen archives and preparation methods are crucial to us!
